  • Classes in metro.GameScreen used by metro 
    Class and Description
    GameScreen
    Every Menu or Game Sreen has to implement this interface for start() and update().
  • Classes in metro.GameScreen used by metro.GameScreen 
    Class and Description
    GameScreen
    Every Menu or Game Sreen has to implement this interface for start() and update().
    GameScreen.InGameMenuWindow
    This is the menu that'll appear when ESC is pressed during the game.
    GameScreen.SettingsWindow
    This is the settings window, that provides some options to configure.
